narrative: Extended the setup script to install frontend dependencies and provide watchers guidance. Updated README to state the script also installs frontend packages, making it easier for contributors to run dev builds.
user_input: On of our agent has represented what we will create with this diagram... You will scaffold and prepare all that is needed ...
scene: Before, the setup script only validated Python packages. Now it installs npm packages and reminds about ENOSPC watcher fixes, ensuring a smoother start for frontend work.
